name: S3
semantic_context: Sends data to any S3-compatible service
natural_language_description: 这是 S3 节点。主要用于: Sends data to any S3-compatible service

s3StandardNotice.displayName: This node is for services that use the S3 standard, e.g. Minio or Digital Ocean Spaces. For AWS S3 use the 'AWS S3' node.
s3StandardNotice.name: s3StandardNotice
s3StandardNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node is for services that use the S3 standard, e.g. Minio or Digital Ocean Spaces. For AWS S3 use the 'AWS S3' node.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: file
available_options: Bucket (值: bucket)
File (值: file)
Folder (值: folder)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: download
available_options: Copy (值: copy) - Copy a file
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a file
Download (值: download) - Download a file
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many files
Upload (值: upload) - Upload a file

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the AWS S3 bucket to delete
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the AWS S3 bucket to delete | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: acl (值: None) - The canned ACL to apply to the object
grantFullControl (值: None) - Whether to give the grantee READ, READ_ACP, and WRITE_ACP permissions on the object
grantRead (值: None) - Whether to allow grantee to read the object data and its metadata
grantReadAcp (值: None) - Whether to allow grantee to read the object ACL
grantWriteAcp (值: None) - Whether to allow grantee to write the ACL for the applicable object
lockLegalHold (值: None) - Whether a legal hold will be applied to this object
lockMode (值: None) - The Object Lock mode that you want to apply to this object
lockRetainUntilDate (值: None) - The date and time when you want this object's Object Lock to expire
parentFolderKey (值: None) - Parent folder you want to create the file in
requesterPays (值: None) - Whether the requester will pay for requests and data transfer. While Requester Pays is enabled, anonymous access to this bucket is disabled.
serverSideEncryption (值: None) - The server-side encryption algorithm used when storing this object in Amazon S3
serverSideEncryptionContext (值: None) - Specifies the AWS KMS Encryption Context to use for object encryption
encryptionAwsKmsKeyId (值: None) - If x-amz-server-side-encryption is present and has the value of aws:kms
serversideEncryptionCustomerAlgorithm (值: None) - Specifies the algorithm to use to when encrypting the object (for example, AES256)
serversideEncryptionCustomerKey (值: None) - Specifies the customer-provided encryption key for Amazon S3 to use in encrypting data
serversideEncryptionCustomerKeyMD5 (值: None) - Specifies the 128-bit MD5 digest of the encryption key according to RFC 1321
storageClass (值: None) - Amazon S3 storage classes

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

bucketName.name: bucketName
bucketName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Bucket Name | (必填项)

folderName.name: folderName
folderName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder Name | (必填项)

folderKey.name: folderKey
folderKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder Key | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fetchOwner (值: None) - The owner field is not present in listV2 by default, if you want to return owner field with each key in the result then set the fetch owner field to true
folderKey (值: None)

sourcePath.name: sourcePath
sourcePath.description: The name of the source bucket should start with (/) and key name of the source object, separated by a slash (/)
sourcePath.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source Path | 作用: The name of the source bucket should start with (/) and key name of the source object, separated by a slash (/) | (必填项)

destinationPath.name: destinationPath
destinationPath.description: The name of the destination bucket and key name of the destination object, separated by a slash (/)
destinationPath.natural_language_description: 参数名: Destination Path | 作用: The name of the destination bucket and key name of the destination object, separated by a slash (/) | (必填项)

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: If not set the binary data filename will be used
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: If not set the binary data filename will be used

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: True

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file to upload

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

tagsUi.name: tagsUi
tagsUi.description: Optional extra headers to add to the message (most headers are allowed)
tagsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tags | 作用: Optional extra headers to add to the message (most headers are allowed) | 默认值: {}
available_options: tagsValues (值: None)

fileKey.name: fileKey
fileKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Key | (必填项)
